title: IT Student — Mobile & Web Developer
subtitle: Learning, building, and growing as a developer every day.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Hi! My name is Akmal, but most friends call me Amayy. I love creating things that "live" on mobile devices and the web. My interest in IT Development started long before I entered college—specifically in middle school, when I randomly downloaded a Visual Basic 6 application source code from the internet, modified it, and felt an unmatched satisfaction when the code finally worked as intended. From that moment, I knew: the IT world is definitely my place.
about.paragraph2: Currently, I'm pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Informatics Engineering and actively building various projects, from Websites to Fullstack Mobile Apps. So far, I've worked on several websites and applications for campus organizations, personal projects, and small experiments that helped me understand more about software, cloud, and anything SaaS-related.

contact.title: Contact
contact.heading: Get In Touch
contact.description: I'm always open to new opportunities, interesting projects, or just discussing technology. Don't hesitate to reach out!
